headline: American Tower Corporation Announces Tax Reporting Information for 2024 Distributions
summary: BOSTON, January 21, 2025--American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) today announced year-end tax reporting information for its 2024 distributions. Stockholders are urged to consult with their personal tax advisors as to their specific tax treatment.

headline: American Tower's Imminent Dividend Hike - Double Digits Data Center Growth
summary: American Tower's much of the outperformance is linked to the growing 5G buildouts. Read why we are upgrading the AMT stock to a Buy here.

headline: Davis Real Estate Fund 2025 Annual Review
summary: In 2024, Davis Real Estate Fund returned 4.89% compared to 9.15% for the Wilshire U.S. Real Estate Securities Index.
